TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ManifestEmbeddedFileProvider extends System.Object implements class Microsoft.Extensions.FileProviders.IFileProvider

Docs.summary: An embedded file provider that uses a manifest compiled in the assembly to reconstruct the original paths of the embedded files when they were embedded into the assembly.

Docs.param: Filter string used to determine what files or folders to monitor. Example: **/*.cs, *.*, subFolder/**/*.cshtml.
